name: Fly Simulator
description: You work as a waiter and lead an uphill battle for their clients. You pushing back the flies from the food, otherwise you'll never get anything. Maybe you are a hungry insect trying to increase their population? Choose the opposing side. The war is already underway.
minimum_requirements: Мінімальні: ОС: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7 Процесор: Dual core CPU @2GHz (Pentium D or better) Оперативна пам’ять: 2 GB ОП Відеокарта: Intel HD 4000, GeForce 8800, ATI 1950 or better DirectX: версії 9.0 Місце на диску: 1 GB доступного місця Звукова карта: 100% DirectX 9.0c compatible audio device
